WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

datajs1.1.1 has problems with parsing Atom/XML format with inline elements when these are empty.
e.g.
<link ... title="keys" href="test(2)/Keys"><m:inline></m:inline>

the parsed JSON object has.
"keys":null

With JSON format it works and the parsed results contains then:

"keys": {"results": []}}

It happens somewhere in the atomReadNavPropLink function....when inlineData is null
WorkItem.Summary: Atom/XML format error with empty inline content
